snippet: Oscar S. Schafer will succeed the current New York Philharmonic chairman, Gary W. Parr, early next year.
abstract: Oscar S. Schafer will succeed the current New York Philharmonic chairman, Gary W. Parr, early next year.
lead_paragraph: Oscar S. Schafer, who with his wife, Didi, has presented the New York Philharmonic’s free concerts in New York City parks since 2007, was elected chairman of the orchestra’s board on Thursday, and will succeed its current chairman, Gary W. Parr, early next year.

headline.main: Oscar S. Schafer Is Elected Chairman of New York Philharmonic’s Board
